title: Allow service codes in dialler tasks
body: For some reason, entering a number with a * at the front in to the dialler task in an app in WP7.5, WP8.0, or WP8.1 results in the message "Please enter service codes directly from the phone's keypad".  This means I can't use GSM service codes in a dialler app, e.g. for settings conditional call forwarding which needs *61* at the front.
